entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 16.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince George Airport 1:00 PM PDT Saturday 10 September 2016

Temperature: 16.2°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 14.5 km
Humidity: 44 %

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers and risk of thunderstorms. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of thunderstorms. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming northwest 30 near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Saturday 10 September 2016
